control.name: ceTopValuesShowOthers
control.description: Sets whether to show the "Others" item within a PivotGridControl when the Top X Value feature is enabled.

control.name: seTop
control.description: Specifies the number of field values that should be displayed for the current row field.

control.name: icbField
control.description: Sets a field whose values' number is limited using the Top X Values feature and sorts these values by summary values in rows.
